name: icy-wind
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A chilling attack that lowers the foe’s SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: A chilling attack that lowers the foe’s SPEED.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A chilling wind is used to attack. It also lowers the SPEED stat.
